title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Physical Science Stream
description: Achieve excellent results in the Physical Science (Maths) stream. A strong grasp of Combined Mathematics and Physics is fundamental for success in an engineering degree program.

title: BSc Engineering Degree (Mechanical)
description: Complete a 4-year BScEng (Hons) degree specializing in Mechanical Engineering from a university recognized by the Institution of Engineers, Sri Lanka (IESL).

title: Graduate Engineer & IESL Associate Membership
description: Secure a position as a Graduate Mechanical Engineer in sectors like manufacturing, power generation, or automotive. Register as an Associate Member of IESL to begin your journey towards becoming a Chartered Engineer.

title: Achieve Chartered Engineer Status
description: Gain a minimum of four years of relevant post-graduate experience under a Chartered Engineer's supervision. Fulfill IESL's requirements and pass the professional review to earn the title of Chartered Engineer (CEng).
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and chartership

title: Senior Engineer / Engineering Manager
description: With experience and chartership, you can advance to senior roles like a Chief Engineer or Engineering Manager, leading teams and overseeing large-scale projects. Specialization in areas like robotics, renewable energy, or automotive engineering is common.
institutes: All major industrial and manufacturing companies
